mapper.insert: insert into register_info (service_instance_id, node_id, datacenter, service) values (#{serviceInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datacenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{service,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into register_info
service_instance_id,
node_id,
datacenter,
service,
#{serviceInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{datacenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{service,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select service_instance_id from register_info where datacenter =#{datacenter}
select service_instance_id from register_info where datacenter = #{datacenter} and service = #{service}
select distinct service from register_info where datacenter = #{datacenter}
mapper.update: update register_info set datacenter = #{datacenter} where node_id =#{node_id}
mapper.select: select distinct node_id from register_info where service = #{service} and datacenter=#{datacenter}
select service_instance_id from register_info where node_id=#{nodeId} and datacenter=#{datacenter}
